title: Interviews with Tarkovsky (Art Documentary).avi
description:
Interviews with Tarkovsky

202 MB | Runtime 18:20 minutes | color | English + Russian with English s/t
Audio : 48000 Hz , 128 Kb/s , 2-ch
Video : XviD , 1400 Kb/s , 29.97 frm/s , 720x480 (3:2)


A video essay on Tarkovsky's work by Harvard film Professor Vlada Petric with excerpts from "Un Poeta nel Cinema: Andreij Tarkovskij" (1984) by Donatella Baglivo.

PS Average quality, for lovers only

PS2 I use VLC player and at beginning he warns that "AVI Index is broken" and gives you option to rebuild index or "play as is" - If you will not use wind/rewind you can use play as option - otherwise you will have to wait that VLC rebuilds index, below a minute...
